title: What are some food and life hacks everyone should know? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Everyone should know at least to prepare khichdi by mixing everything in one pot, that is, rice, dal, subzi or vegetables as per own choice. Similarly, for those who avoid rice, can use oats or dalia.

A really great TIP or TRICK is to use proper English words, which are perfectly good for communication. Hacking can mean several things such as illegally breaking into a computer network or chopping at wood or even having a very painful cough, but it is not a synonym for advice, TIPs or TRICKs.
